projects.title: Data Gridder
projects.description: Datagridder is a tool built to solve problem of collecting and orgarnizing data in Nigerian Universities. With a simple to use user interface, class representatives can easliy collect data, this data is then automatically sorted into a well orgarnized .docx document table available for download.

projects.title: Bridgegap clothing
projects.description: While working on the backend, collaborated with a frontend developer to deliver a website for a clothing brand for the purpose of showcasing thier products
